        Custom query to compute all posts and other details where most active term occurs
        Parameters:
        mostactiveterm - query string for most active term
        date_start - query string for start date range
        date_end - query string for end of date range
        all_blog_ids - query string for all selected blog_ids
        limit - query string for limit to display
        Returns:
        JSONObject result

        Custom Elasticsearch query to perform aggregation
        Parameters:
        terms - query string for most active term
        ids - query string for all selected blog_ids
        from - query string for start date range
        to - query string for end of date range
        index - query string for selected index or table
        field - query string for field
        sort - query string for field to sort on
        type - query string for type of aggregation (e.g bucket_highest, bucket_length)
